description:
Do you use Apache Spark and wish to be able to store, interpret, visualise and demonstrate your results outside of console?

Looking at real data - reported Chicago Crimes since 1991, we will take a look at various analyses such as:

  • Crime distribution among years and months
  • Drug reports visualised on streets of Chicago (Google Maps)
  • Crack vs Heroin usage among years on beautiful C3 Charts
  • Vehicle thefts exercise and solution

This course goes fast, is very hands on, and we don't waste any time. If you follow steps through this course, then at the end you will be able to visualise and interpret your analyses.
title: Apache Spark - Hands on Interactive Visualization
